item.tinkersinnovation.pick_dart.descrip: Pick Dart is a boomerang that can both mine and attack.
item.tinkersinnovation.heavy_shield.desc: Heavy Shield is a shield that can be used to attack.
item.tinkersinnovation.butcher_knife.des: Butcher knives can cause huge damage to animals.
material.tinkersinnovation.polychrome_al: A colored alloy formed by mixing multiple materials.
Materials will be professionally reinforced for all materials above level four.
The power of the void allows it to destroy the bedrock.
material.tinkersinnovation.enchantment_e: The enchantment book refined from the smelting furnace.
The enchantment of high-temperature recombination has the ability to randomly grant state effects.
The main components of the Undying Totem.
Every durability point in the future will become a bit of your health.
material.tinkersinnovation.ocean_essence: The high temperature caused it to separate from the trident.
The ocean has nothing else to offer you except underwater breathing.
material.tinkersinnovation.slimton.flavo: It's time to be a BIG SHOT!
material.tinkersinnovation.slimton.encyc: This material has an unimaginable amplification effect on projectiles.
material.tinkersinnovation.ether.flavor: The mysterious substance inside the wither's body.
material.tinkersinnovation.ether.encyclo: This material has a certain inhibitory effect on other organisms.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.ocean_blessin: When the tool consumes durability in water, it will give players underwater breathing for 10 seconds per level.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.enchantment.d: During the attack, BUFF will be randomly added to the attacker and DEBUFF will be added to the victim.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.vitality.desc: When an item consumes durability, players will restore the same amount of health as the consumed durability.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.omnipotent.de: The material will strengthen all other materials above level four on the same tool.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.big_heart.des: This armor enhancement will continuously restore health before reaching full health.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.fast_eat.flav: There is no waste at all.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.fast_eat.desc: All dropped items of the tool will be converted to the player's hunger value, one point per level.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.chromatic_abe: The wool dropped during tool shearing is of random color.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.berserker.des: When there is no resistance improvement on the body and damage is taken, reduce the square point health of the level, increase the power, speed, and resistance of the level * 5 seconds, and the effect level is enhancement level, with a maximum of five levels.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.mounted_strik: Step onto the saddle and charge forward!
When riding an entity, the weapon damage becomes a power of 1.25 times the original weapon damage, with a maximum of five levels.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.suppress.flav: The mysterious substance in the body of the wither has a good suppressive effect on other creatures.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.suppress.desc: The victim loses underwater breathing, increases resistance, fire resistance, luck, increases health, absorbs damage, recovers health, and gains a first level enhancement level of 10 seconds of withering.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.trader.flavor: It wants to make a DEAL, but don't give it MONEY!
modifier.tinkersinnovation.trader.descri: Items will no longer drop experience, but there is a 10% chance at each level that they will drop double the drop.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.big_shot.flav: DON'T YOU WANNA BE A BIG SHOT?
modifier.tinkersinnovation.big_shot.desc: The weapon will increase the bowing speed, initial arrow speed, and accuracy by 1% of the square root of the mucous layer.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.slaughter.fla: Trembling in front of the butcher's knife!
modifier.tinkersinnovation.slaughter.des: Tools will cause double damage to animals.
death.attack.tconstruct.fiberglass_prick: %1$s died in a fit of rage
%1$s died in a fit of rage while fighting against %2$s
